util

Class CardUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.CardUtils

  • public class CardUtils
extends Object
    Utility class providing methods to evaluate poker hands, compare players’ hands, and display hand combinations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CardUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Player compareHands(Game game)
      Compares all active (non-folded) players’ hands and returns the winning player.

      Evaluates the combined strength of a player's hand and the community cards.
      static Card.Rank getHighestRank(ArrayList<Card> playerHand, ArrayList<Card> communityCards)
      Finds the highest card rank present in the combined player and community hand.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CardUtils

        public CardUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • compareHands

        public static Player compareHands(Game game)
        Compares all active (non-folded) players’ hands and returns the winning player. Winners are determined first by hand strength, then by highest rank on ties.
        Parameters:
        game - the current Game instance containing players and community cards
        Returns:
        the Player with the best hand, or null if no players remain

      • evaluateHand

        public static int evaluateHand(ArrayList<Card> playerHand,
                               ArrayList<Card> communityCards)
        Evaluates the combined strength of a player's hand and the community cards. Returns an integer where 1 represents the strongest hand (Royal Flush) and 10 the weakest (High Card).
        Parameters:
        playerHand - the list of the player's private cards
        communityCards - the list of community cards on the table
        Returns:
        numeric strength ranking (1 strongest, 10 weakest)

      • getHighestRank

        public static Card.Rank getHighestRank(ArrayList<Card> playerHand,
                                       ArrayList<Card> communityCards)
        Finds the highest card rank present in the combined player and community hand. This is used to break ties when multiple hands have equal strength.
        Parameters:
        playerHand - the list of the player's private cards
        communityCards - the list of community cards on the table
        Returns:
        the highest Card.Rank found

      • printCombination

        public static void printCombination(ArrayList<Card> playerHand,
                                    ArrayList<Card> communityCards)
        Prints the type of poker hand combination (e.g., "Full House", "Straight").
        Parameters:
        playerHand - the list of the player's private cards
        communityCards - the list of community cards on the table

      • sortCardsByDecreasingRank

        public static void sortCardsByDecreasingRank(ArrayList<Card> cards)
